pages.text: $(9)Attack Knockback$() is how far you knockback enemies when you attack them.$(p)Each point will cause hit enemies to be pushed half a block away.$(p)Weapons and shields may provide this stat.
$(9)$(n)Base Value:$() 0$(p)$(9)$(n)Max Value:$() 5$(p)Note: The Knockback enchantment provides a bonus equivalent to this stat, but it doesn't count towards the max value cap.
